Title: Spectral Broadening of Gaussian Process in Optical Fibre and Implication on the Spectral Efficiency
Abstract: © 2018 IEEE.We characterise the spectral evolution of Gaussian process in optical fibre using the Kolmogorov-Zakharov model. At high power regime, the spectrum at receiver is calculated by iteratively solving KZ-model at shorter distance. It questions the possibility of monotonically increasing spectral efficiency.
